channel.title: Monthly Reports on Baltic Security Foundation
channel.description: Recent content in Monthly Reports on Baltic Security Foundation

item.title: Baltic Security Foundation Team Activities in November
item.description: This month the Baltic Security Foundation team has been very active on both sides of the Atlantic Ocean, continuing existing projects and pursuing new areas of cooperation with likeminded experts and stakeholders.

item.title: Regional Activities
item.description: October 2019 has been busy for the Baltic Security Foundation, pursuing our goal of fostering and promoting Baltic defense and security.
